#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        int k;
        cin>>k;

        char way[n];
        cin>>way;

        //. dry , # puddle

        int maxLen=0;
        int len=0;

        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            if(way[i]=='#')
            len++;
            else
            len = 0;

            if(maxLen < len)
                maxLen = len;
        }

        if(maxLen >= k)
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
}
